title: Oia Village, Santorini
description: Whitewashed domes and blue roofs cascading toward the Aegean with sunsets that light the caldera in gold and magenta.

title: Fushimi Inari Shrine, Kyoto
description: A corridor of thousands of vermilion torii gates winding up Mount Inari, surrounded by cedar forest and stone fox guardians.
address: 68 Fukakusa Yabunouchicho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto, Japan

title: Moraine Lake, Banff
description: Glacial turquoise framed by the Valley of the Ten Peaks, mirror-calm mornings, and larch forests turning gold in autumn.
creator: seed-user

title: Mount Otemanu, Bora Bora
description: Emerald volcanic spires rising above lagoon blues, overwater bungalows, and glass-clear shallows shaded by palms.

title: Cappadocia Balloons, Göreme
description: Hundreds of sunrise balloons floating above honeycombed caves and fairy chimneys carved into tawny tuff cliffs.
